item.description:
Details on how to get to the Restaurant and Parking
The Jacob Wirth Restaurant is located at 31-37 Stuart Street, between Tremont and Washington Streets in Boston.

It is also convenient to several subway stations, including New England Medical Center on the Orange Line and Boylston Street on the Green Line.

Parking
There is a parking lot next door to the restaurant, with two hours free parking for restaurant patrons.
